title: The Writer's Almanac -  Saturday, April 10, 2021
description: F. Scott Fitzgerald’s classic “The Great Gatsby” was published on this day in 1925. This year it entered the public domain, joining Fitzgeralds' works “This Side of Paradise” and “The Beautiful and the Damned”.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
